name: PHP Astrolog Shell
short_description: PHP Astrolog Shell is a project using PHP writen web interface as an frontend of the astrology software "Astrolog". It's goal is to provide a web interface for Astrolog to be operated via internet. It uses Astrolog as the engine and netpbm to convert diff
